title: Junior Developer
description:
Wired Works is a U.S.-based IT consulting and software agency specializing in full-stack web and SaaS application development.
We help startups and established companies design, build, and scale modern software solutions — from custom web apps to automation integrations and digital products.

Our small, talented team values clean code, creative problem-solving, and practical innovation. We believe in empowering our developers to learn, grow, and take ownership of their work.

 

About the Role:

We’re looking for a motivated Junior Developer who’s eager to gain real-world experience in modern web development and software engineering.
You’ll work closely with our senior engineers on active client projects, contributing to front-end and back-end development, integrations, and automation tasks.

This position is ideal for computer science students, bootcamp graduates, or junior developers looking to grow their skills in a professional environment.

 

What You’ll Do

 - Assist in building and maintaining web and SaaS applications.

 - Work on front-end (React, Next.js, or similar) and/or back-end (Node.js, Express, Python, etc.) projects.

 - Collaborate on database integrations (PostgreSQL, Supabase, Firebase, etc.).

 - Help design and test APIs, automation flows, and third-party integrations.

 - Participate in code reviews, stand-ups, and project planning sessions.

 - Learn and apply software development best practices.

 

What We’re Looking For

 - Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and at least one framework (React, Vue, or similar).

 - Familiarity with Node.js, Python, or any back-end language is a plus.

 - Interest in APIs, databases, or automation tools (like HubSpot, Zapier, or Make.com).

 - Strong problem-solving mindset and willingness to learn.

 - Good communication and collaboration skills.

 - Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.

 

Nice to Have

 - Experience with Git/GitHub version control.

 - Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Vercel, or similar).

 - Interest in UI/UX or web design fundamentals.

 - Previous internship, freelance, or project experience.

 

Why Join Wired Works

 - Gain hands-on experience in real client projects.

 - Work alongside experienced developers and designers.

 - Learn how professional agencies manage and deliver software solutions.

 - Flexible, remote-first culture with growth opportunities.

 - Potential for long-term employment after internship.
